snippet.title: Game & Watch - Super Mario Bros. (Crystal Screen) (c)1986 Nintendo [MAME emulation footage]
snippet.description:
This the Game & Watch Super Mario Bros. handheld game, a Nintendo product released in 1986 and one of 3 units that were released as both New Wide Screen and Crystal Screen units.

These games differ slightly from other Game & Watch entries in that they don't have a Game A and Game B feature, but just a single game mode.  While this unit does have many fans I find it to rely too much on knowledge of the game - the platform blocks are reused for many different things and it isn't always clear if you can stand on them without prior knowledge of the game.  In that sense this lacks the simplicity of the early Game & Watch units and starts treading in territory closer to the Tiger units.

It is believed that the Crystal Screen and New Wide Screen versions of these share the same MCU and ROM data, with only the case and screen being different.

Recent work on Game & Watch emulation has come from Algestam, with earlier work being done by Sean Riddle and hap.  DarthMarino provided the artwork for more recently emulated units, while hydef was generally responsible for the artwork on ones emulated before 2020, links to the artwork are below

https://drive.google.com/drive/u/1/folders/1vl9O-0jIGCHHY_lrWpOwBtqTXEKsVGOY  DarthMarino 
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1WLKcvynl0ky2mRL1UacA9yaiMTnNs4x5 hydef
